name: Extreme Horse Racing Simulator 3D
description:
Extreme Horse Racing Simulator 3D game is an arcade game comprised of three horses you have to collect the diamonds come your way as much as you could to score high. Its environment is based on factory area, fire, tracks, and keen turns and throughout hurdles during journey.

As it is an endless game you need to move on because more challenging tracks will come your way to test your skills or ride. Keep alert while racing as hitting a single hurdle will fail you and you have to restart your game.

You have two controls swipe and arrow keys. You can play this game through swipe as well as through arrow keys for left, right and jump. Avoid hurdles because hitting them cause to restart the game.
You can share the link of this horse racing game with others as well.
It’s an endless challenging game of 2017. Download it and enjoy endless journey with your favorite horse.

How to play:
• Tap play icon
• Select from three given champion horses
• Tap to start the game
• Score on left top corner
• Gems score on left top corner
• Life line on top right corner
• Obstacles throughout the way

Features:
• Easy to navigate
• Easy to play
• Controls are responsive
• Endless 3D game
• Share it
